AppendNumber.Label: Append Number
AppendNumber.Hint: Append a number between 1 and 100 to the name of newly created macros

CollisionAttempts.Label: Collision Attempts
CollisionAttempts.Hint: Number of times to reroll the number attempting to avoid collision before giving up

DeleteEmpty.Label: Delete Empty Macros
DeleteEmpty.Hint: If an edit macro window is closed with an empty command field, should the macro document be deleted
